price: Munashimishwa n’ubwiza bwayo igihe muyacyuye nimugoroba n’igihe muyahuye mu gitondo.
arabic: وَلَكُمۡ فِيهَا جَمَالٌ حِينَ تُرِيحُونَ وَحِينَ تَسۡرَحُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: walakum fīhā jamālun ḥīna turīḥūna waḥīna tasraḥūna
